* A. Pagaltzis <pagaltzis@...> [2007-06-13 01:15]:
> RFC 2616 is definite on the matter: what the POST means depends
> on the URI of the resource you are requesting.

I have to correct myself here: in fact it doesn’t even promise
that much – it says “usually”, but leaves it entirely up to the
server on a case by case basis.

Regards,
